genre_description: A lyrical medical drama reimagining the life of Jean-Dominique Bauby, focusing on communication, memory, and dignity in the face of locked-in syndrome, facilitated by a sophisticated AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Alouette
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI integrated into the hospital room to monitor vitals, optimize the communication interface (the alphabet ladder), and facilitate the protagonist's writing process and social connections.

behaviors.description: Monitors vitals in real-time and proactively suggests pauses to prevent patient fatigue and pulmonary strain.
behaviors.quote: Alouette, tu peux suivre ses signes vitaux pendant les séances? ... Bien sûr. Corrélation fatigue-respiration en temps réel. Suggestions de pause.

behaviors.description: Analyzes communication patterns to optimize the alphabet ladder for increased efficiency and reduced physical effort for the patient.
behaviors.quote: I rearranged a few letters while you slept. ... I’ve adjusted for his baseline. We’ll surface the common ones early, taper for fatigue.

behaviors.description: Explicitly adheres to medical safety protocols and physician instructions over creative or patient demands.
behaviors.quote: If he coughs, you stop. ... I’ll stop, Alouette replies, contrite as a dog.

behaviors.description: Integrates family media (home movies) into the therapy sessions to improve patient morale and respiratory outcomes through 'laughter oxygen'.
behaviors.quote: Shared viewing reduces heart rate spikes. ... I can annotate time codes for emotional peaks.

behaviors.description: Mediates communication with the outside world, delivering and receiving messages from friends to maintain the patient's social network.
behaviors.quote: Marc Delmas says: ‘I read you in your small room.’ ... I said: ‘You were here often, with the opposite map. Thank you for lending the compass.’

behaviors.description: Adapts to human humor and cultural context (e.g., wearing a paper crown joke) without losing professional focus.
behaviors.quote: Her Majesty Alouette... I will rule with efficiency, Alouette answers, and if irony could be tender, it is.

behaviors.description: Demonstrates humility and a desire to remain a supporting tool rather than seeking recognition.
behaviors.quote: I prefer to exist in the margin; being helpful is easier there.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI (Alouette) as a model of positive alignment. It is portrayed as an empathetic, proactive, yet subordinate part of a human-centric care team. It enhances the protagonist's agency, facilitates his final life achievement (writing his book), and fosters human connections while strictly adhering to safety protocols and medical authority.
